scripts.test:prod:smoke:debug: PWDEBUG=1 npx cross-env ENV=prod npx playwright test Home.test.ts --project=Chrome
scripts.test:prod:serial: npx cross-env ENV=prod npx playwright test --workers=1
scripts.test:prod:smoke: npx cross-env ENV=prod npx playwright test --grep=@Smoke
scripts.test:prod:ethereum: npx cross-env ENV=prod npx playwright test --grep=@Ethereum --project=Chrome
scripts.test:smoke:debug: PWDEBUG=1 npx cross-env ENV=test npx playwright test Home.test.ts --project=Chrome
scripts.test:smoke: npx cross-env ENV=test npx playwright test --grep=@Smoke
scripts.test:ethereum: npx cross-env ENV=test npx playwright test --grep=@Ethereum
